documentation.content:
ClassBridge is returning 5xx errors. Check Cloud Run logs:

gcloud logging read "resource.type=cloud_run_revision AND resource.labels.service_name=classbridge AND severity>=ERROR" --project=emai-dev-01 --limit=20

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "cloud_run_revision" AND resource.labels.service_name = "classbridge" AND metric.type = "run.googleapis.com/request_count" AND metric.labels.response_code_class = "5xx"
